<template>
 
</template>

<script setup>
import {ref, computed } from 'vue'
//import Cart from '/Cart.vue'
import productsData from '@/assets/products.json'
const items = ref(productsData)
const cart= ref([])

const filteredItems = computed( () =>{ 
  return items.value  ; 
})
function addToCart(id){ 
  cart.value.push(items.value[id])
}

</script>

<style scoped>
.part-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-around;
}

.part-item {
  margin: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  padding: 15px;
  text-align: center;
  width: 200px;
}

.part-image {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}

button {
  background-color: #4CAF50;
  color: white;
  padding: 10px;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
}

button:hover {
  background-color: #45a049;
}
</style>
